data.title: Why did Jessica leave Suits: The real reason behind Gina Torres's exit?
data.meta_description: Are you interested in knowing why did Jessica leave Suits? Check out this article to learn why Gina Torres exited Suits and what she’s doing now.
data.text:
In 2016, during the Suits midseason finale, Jessica Pearson – the queen bee of Pearson Specter Litt, the top law firm at the heart of the series – saved a death-row inmate life. Then, she saved her sanity by quitting. This episode in the sixth season of Suits marked the end of a character, Jessica Pearson, who had been with the legal drama series from the beginning. So, why did Jessica leave Suits?

Gina Torres, who played Jessica Pearson, is one of the original cast members of Suits, which is about the professional and personal lives of New York's best closer. As a Pearson Specter Litt boss, she oversaw the law firm's overall operations while dealing with in-politics involving the firm's two best lawyers.

Why did Jessica leave Suits so suddenly?

Gina Torres, the actress who brought Jessica to life in Suits, opted to exit the show due to its strain on her personal life. The timing was opportune, coinciding with the expiration of her contract.

In an interview with the New York Times, Gina Torres explained she was tired of the constant travel between Toronto, the filming location of the show, and Los Angeles, where she resided with her then-husband, actor Laurence Fishburne, and their daughter.

When did Jessica leave Suits?

What episode does Jessica die in Suits? Jessica doesn’t die in Suits. However, at the end of season six, Jessica Pearson wants to focus on her relationship with Jeff Malone (D.B. Woodside), so the two relocate to Chicago, where she starts a new career.

Jessica's Chicago life was to be the centre of the 2019 Suits spinoff, Pearson. However, the spinoff series Pearson was cancelled after one season, ending her political journey in Chicago.

Does Jessica come back to suits?

Despite leaving at season six, Jessica appeared in several episodes of Season 7 to finalise her Suits storyline and set up things for the spinoff, Pearson.

Her plot is about her disbarment because of the fall she took for Mike in season 6, which prevents her from practising law in New York State. Her powerful Chicago enemies also try to disbar her in Illinois. She later takes a job with a corrupt Chicago mayor, entering the political world.

Where is Gina Torres now?

After leaving Suits, the 55-year-old actress has been involved in several projects. On March 2, 2020, she was announced as a cast playing Cleo Phillips in The Brides, but ABC didn't pick it up. She plays the Tommy Vega character in the Fox drama TV series 9-1-1: Lone Star.

FAQs about Gina Torres and Suits

How old is Jessica on Suits? Gina Torres was born on April 25, 1969, meaning she was around 43 years old when the show premiered in 2011.

Why was Suits cancelled? The Suits showrunners faced a few casting changes, which made them decide to end it after season 9.

Where was Suits filmed? The first episode of Suits was shot in the bustling backdrop of New York City, the series' primary setting located at Kirkland & Ellis LLP. Subsequent episodes were filmed in Toronto, specifically at Downsview Park Studios.

How many seasons was Gina Torres on Suits? Gina Torres was on Suits for six seasons. However, she decided to leave after season six due to the filming schedule's toll on her personal life.

Who is Jessica’s sister on Suits? Leah is the younger sister of Jessica Pearson. In "Intent", Jessica invites her to a restaurant to discuss Malone.

Why did Mike and Jessica leave Suits? Jessica Pearson, Rachel Zane, and Mike Ross departed from the series for diverse reasons, such as pursuing marriage, seeking personal and professional fulfilment, and transitioning to alternative career paths.

Who becomes managing partner after Jessica? Hardman won the partner's vote, including Louis's, and replaced Jessica as managing partner. He and Louis made Mike's and Harvey's work lives miserable.

Wrapping up

Gina Torres's sudden departure from the show left fans asking, "Why did Jessica leave Suits?" Gina later revealed in an interview that she left the show because it was straining her personal life, plus her contract was up.
